Key Match Events: Travis Jankowski robbed Andrew Vaughn of a game-winning homer with a leaping catch in the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Rangers manager Bruce Bochy said he had to make a small adjustment because of the lack of fans in the stands
Post-Match Reflections: Interim manager Grady Sizemore said of the nightcap: 'That's a tough game to lose. We played well, did everything right. They got some key hits when they needed it and stole one from us at a good time.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox (31-103) have lost six in a row and 10 of 11 overall.
Corey Seager had four hits, including a tiebreaking single in the ninth
Wyatt Langford hit a three-run homer in the second game for Texas
Others: Rangers left-hander Andrew Heaney allowed five hits in five innings
Rangers right-hander Jacob deGrom's second minor league rehab start went so well the right-hander went to the bullpen for more work after he was removed
